img_above_text:
![Thunderbolt Horn .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/49/Thunderbolt_Horn_.jpg)| Thunderbolt Horn| Uncommon | Using the gourd moderately increases Shock resistance for a short duration | After completing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge, it is found at the Shen Monkey Vendor at Bamboo Grove - Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain| Thunderbolt Horn
![Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2e/Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg)| Stranded Loong's Whisker| Epic | Using the gourd moderately extends the duration of the next Immobilize Spell for a short duration | At the Mirrormere Shrine in The New West, walk onto the lake In the far right corner at the back of the lake you can find the Soak in a container | Stranded Loong's Whisker
img_below_text:
![Black-myth-wukong-turtle-tear.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/1e/Black-myth-wukong-turtle-tear.jpg)| Turtle Tear| Epic | When at full Health, using the gourd recovers a moderate amount of Mana | Found in North Shore of the Bitter Lake at Bitter Lake in The New West, along the right side of the shore Interact with the skeleton at the back of the area to spawn the Soak back on the shoreline | Turtle Tear
![Black-myth-wukong-tender-jade-lotus.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ea/Black-myth-wukong-tender-jade-lotus.jpg)| Tender Jade Lotus| Rare | Using the gourd slightly increases a small amount of defense for a short duration | Randomly obtained from Jade Lotus plants | Turtle Tear
summary_promot:
You are shown an image extracted from a video game walkthrough or guide.


        
        Context:
        - Preceding Text: "![Thunderbolt Horn .jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/4/49/Thunderbolt_Horn_.jpg)| Thunderbolt Horn| Uncommon | Using the gourd moderately increases Shock resistance for a short duration | After completing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge, it is found at the Shen Monkey Vendor at Bamboo Grove - Marsh of White Mist Shrine in Black Wind Mountain| Thunderbolt Horn
![Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/2/2e/Black-myth-wukong-stranded-loongs-whisker.jpg)| Stranded Loong's Whisker| Epic | Using the gourd moderately extends the duration of the next Immobilize Spell for a short duration | At the Mirrormere Shrine in The New West, walk onto the lake In the far right corner at the back of the lake you can find the Soak in a container | Stranded Loong's Whisker"
        - Following Text: "![Black-myth-wukong-turtle-tear.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/1/1e/Black-myth-wukong-turtle-tear.jpg)| Turtle Tear| Epic | When at full Health, using the gourd recovers a moderate amount of Mana | Found in North Shore of the Bitter Lake at Bitter Lake in The New West, along the right side of the shore Interact with the skeleton at the back of the area to spawn the Soak back on the shoreline | Turtle Tear
![Black-myth-wukong-tender-jade-lotus.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/ea/Black-myth-wukong-tender-jade-lotus.jpg)| Tender Jade Lotus| Rare | Using the gourd slightly increases a small amount of defense for a short duration | Randomly obtained from Jade Lotus plants | Turtle Tear"

        Your task:
        1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
        2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
        3. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.
img_summary: The image depicts a vibrant red coral-like object placed on an ornate dish, likely representing an in-game item from *Black Myth: Wukong*. Based on the context, it could be one of the collectible or usable items tied to the game's mechanics involving gourds, which grant temporary buffs or effects. The preceding and following text lists similar items with descriptions of their effects and locations, suggesting this image is part of a guide detailing item functionality and acquisition in the game.
